sentences.english: A new introduction has been prefixed to the third printing of the book.
sentences.chinese: 本书第三次印刷时前面增加了一篇新的序言。

sentences.english: Besides the preface and conclusion, the paper has six chapters.
sentences.chinese: 除了序言和结语外，论文共有六章。

sentences.english: My good friend, Dr. Henry Kissinger, wrote a wonderful foreword, which adds luster to the book.
sentences.chinese: 我的好朋友辛格博士写了精彩的序言，为这本书增色。

sentences.english: Besides preface and final words, the thesis consists of 3 chapters, about 50,000 Chinese characters.
sentences.chinese: 除序言和结语外，全文共三章，计5万余字。

sentences.english: The same remark applies to all prefatory notions whatever about philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 所有哲学的序言概念，都是由同样的方法得到的。

sentences.english: He prefaced the diaries with a short account of how they were discovered.
sentences.chinese: 他给这本日记写了序言，简述日记发现的经过。

sentences.english: This book has a foreword by the President.
sentences.chinese: 这本书有一篇总统作的序言。

sentences.english: She read foreward and introduction soon.
sentences.chinese: 她很快读完了序言和导论。

sentences.english: These prefaces are usually of much less historical interest.
sentences.chinese: 这些序言通常是较少历史利益。

sentences.english: In the prologue, the first thing you do is save the link register.
sentences.chinese: 在序言中，所要做的第一件事情是保存链接寄存器。

sentences.english: The preface of the book was well written.
sentences.chinese: 这本书的序言写得很好。

sentences.english: Ive finished my introduction to the book.
sentences.chinese: 我已经写好了这本书的序言。

sentences.english: The preface of the book was written by a famous writer.
sentences.chinese: 这本书的序言是由一个闻名作家写的。

sentences.english: The subject has been referred to cursorily in the preface.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题在序言中已粗略地提到了。

sentences.english: The book has a preface written by the author.
The preface of this book is written by a famous writer.
sentences.chinese: 这本书的序言是由一个著名作家写的。

definition: author's preface/autobiographical notes as introduction to a book
preface/foreword/preamble/recital (law)/also written 敘文|叙文[xu4 wen2]
start of literary work/opening song of ballad in Tanci style 彈詞|弹词[tan2 ci2]
entire book/unabridged book/entire multi-volume work/comprehensive volume
name of a book/reputation as calligrapher
impression of a book/opinion expressed in a book review
